reviewText: Stuart Adamson was a great singer/songwriter/performer that was sadly underpromoted by the record labels. If you have any Scottish or Irish blood in you, listening to this group will be like a trip home. They've got so much great material to discover if you love music. [...]

Amazing performance from hometown heroes and the crowd just goes wild.  And there would be many more over the next 20 years at the Barrowlands in Glasgow.  The sound/video is amazing quality for 1983.  Highly recommended.
